# Core Rule 3 - Roleplay is expected.
- Keep in character chat in character.
- Keep out of character chat out of character.
- Interact with the roleplay aspect of the server.
## Examples
### [bold] Permitted [/bold]
- Using LOOC to teach new players controls and mechanics. - Talking about mechanics through in-game means.
### [bold] Not Permitted [/bold]
- Talking about in-game events in OOC / LOOC chat (mid round) - Talking about real world events in in-game chat.
